Name: Project Initialization
Description: Set up the initial Git repository structure and configure branch protection rules for the team

Name: CI/CD Pipeline Setup
Description: Configure automated build and linting pipelines to ensure code quality before merging

Name: Database Schema Design
Description: Analyze requirements and design the Entity Relationship Diagram for the core database tables

Name: Database Environment Setup
Description: Initialize the PostgreSQL database container with Docker and apply initial configuration

Name: Authentication Module
Description: Create the basic directory structure and module configuration for user authentication

Name: User Registration Logic
Description: Implement the backend service to handle new user sign-ups including data validation

Name: Security Implementation
Description: Integrate password hashing algorithms to securely store user credentials

Name: Token Management
Description: Set up JWT generation and validation strategies to secure API endpoints

Name: Login Functionality
Description: Develop the logic to verify user credentials and issue access tokens upon successful login

Name: User Profile Retrieval
Description: Implement functionality to retrieve and display the current user's profile information

Name: Frontend Setup
Description: Initialize the client-side application using React and configure the build tools

Name: UI Theme Configuration
Description: Set up the design system and configure the global color palette and typography

Name: Login Screen UI
Description: Design and implement the user interface for the login page with error handling

Name: Registration Screen UI
Description: Create the user registration form with client-side validation for all inputs

Name: State Management Setup
Description: Configure the global state store to manage user authentication status

Name: Auth Integration
Description: Connect the frontend login and registration forms to the backend API services

Name: Cross-Origin Config
Description: Configure CORS policies to allow secure communication between frontend and backend

Name: Dashboard Layout
Description: Build the main application shell including the sidebar navigation and header

Name: Product Data Model
Description: Define the database entities and relationships required for product management

Name: Product Management API
Description: Develop the backend endpoints to create read update and delete products

Name: Data Seeding
Description: Create a script to populate the database with dummy data for development purposes

Name: Product Catalog UI
Description: Develop the main grid view to display available products to the user

Name: Filtering Logic
Description: Implement backend logic to filter database results based on category and price range

Name: Filter Sidebar UI
Description: Create the user interface controls for filtering the product list

Name: Auth Unit Testing
Description: Write unit tests to verify the correctness of the authentication service logic

Name: Product Unit Testing
Description: Write unit tests to ensure product management business logic handles edge cases

Name: E2E Test Environment
Description: Set up the end-to-end testing framework to simulate real user scenarios

Name: Login Persistence Fix
Description: Resolve an issue where the user session was not persisting after page reload

Name: Code Refactoring
Description: Refactor the user controller to improve code readability and reduce duplication

Name: Order Data Model
Description: Design the database tables to store order information and order items

Name: Order Creation Logic
Description: Implement the business logic to process a user's cart and generate a new order

Name: Cart Storage Backend
Description: Set up a temporary storage mechanism (Redis) to hold user shopping cart items

Name: Cart Drawer UI
Description: Develop a sliding drawer component to show the contents of the shopping cart

Name: Add to Cart Feature
Description: Implement the frontend logic to add products to the global cart state

Name: Order History Service
Description: Create the backend service to retrieve a list of past orders for a specific user

Name: Order History Page
Description: Design the frontend page to display a table of the user's previous orders

Name: Payment Integration
Description: Integrate the third-party payment gateway to handle secure credit card transactions

Name: Payment Webhooks
Description: Implement a webhook handler to update order status upon successful payment

Name: Calculation Fix
Description: Fix a rounding error in the total price calculation logic for orders

Name: Email Service Config
Description: Configure the email provider integration for sending transactional emails

Name: Welcome Emails
Description: Implement logic to send a welcome email automatically after user registration

Name: Order Receipts
Description: Set up automated email receipts to be sent after a successful purchase

Name: Admin Access Control
Description: Implement role-based access control to restrict administrative routes

Name: Admin Analytics UI
Description: Create a dashboard view for admins showing key sales and user metrics

Name: User Moderation Tools
Description: Develop an interface for admins to view and ban suspicious user accounts

Name: Product Editing UI
Description: Create a form for administrators to modify existing product details

Name: Image Uploads
Description: Implement functionality to upload and store product images in cloud storage

Name: Image Optimization
Description: Set up a serverless function to automatically resize images for better performance

Name: Database Tuning
Description: Analyze query performance and add necessary indexes to foreign key columns

Name: Mobile Layout Fix
Description: Fix layout issues preventing the application from rendering correctly on mobile devices

Name: Performance Optimization
Description: Audit the application bundle size and implement code splitting to improve load time

Name: Route Lazy Loading
Description: Refactor the routing configuration to load page components only when needed

Name: API Documentation
Description: Add comprehensive comments and decorators to generate Swagger API documentation

Name: Rate Limiting
Description: Configure API rate limiting to prevent abuse and denial of service attacks

Name: Logging Infrastructure
Description: Set up a centralized logging system to track errors and application events

Name: Cart Bug Fix
Description: Fix a critical bug where the cart would empty itself unexpectedly

Name: Auth Middleware Refactor
Description: Simplify the authentication middleware to make it more maintainable

Name: Search Backend
Description: Implement full-text search capabilities to allow finding products by name or description

Name: Search Component
Description: Create a search bar with auto-suggestion capabilities for the frontend

Name: Real-time Notifications
Description: Set up a WebSocket gateway to push real-time updates to connected clients

Name: Notification Toasts
Description: Implement a UI component to display ephemeral success and error messages

Name: Staging Deployment
Description: Configure the deployment pipeline to push the latest build to the staging server

Name: Staging Smoke Test
Description: Perform a manual pass through critical user flows on the staging environment

Name: Migration Fix
Description: Resolve a database migration conflict causing deployment failures

Name: Security Audit
Description: Review and rotate all sensitive environment variables and API keys

Name: Code Review
Description: Review pull requests from the team to ensure code standards are met

Name: Sprint Planning
Description: Participate in the team meeting to estimate tasks for the upcoming sprint

Name: Design Sync
Description: Meet with the design team to review high-fidelity mockups for new features

Name: Dependency Update
Description: Update core framework dependencies to their latest stable versions

Name: Deprecation Fixes
Description: Resolve console warnings caused by deprecated methods in updated libraries

Name: Accessibility Review
Description: Audit the application forms to ensure they meet WCAG 2.1 accessibility standards

Name: Aria Labels
Description: Add missing accessibility labels to icon-only buttons throughout the app

Name: Integration Testing
Description: Write tests to verify the data flow from the cart to order creation

Name: Load Testing
Description: Perform stress testing on the API to determine maximum concurrent user capacity

Name: Caching Strategy
Description: Implement Redis caching for high-traffic API endpoints to reduce latency

Name: SEO Optimization
Description: Update meta tags and favicon to improve search engine visibility

Name: Error Pages
Description: Design and implement custom 404 and 500 error pages

Name: Feedback System
Description: Create a form allowing users to submit feedback or report bugs

Name: Feedback Storage
Description: Develop an API endpoint to store user feedback in the database

Name: Dark Mode Logic
Description: Implement a theme provider to toggle between light and dark visual modes

Name: Dark Mode Styling
Description: Fix contrast issues and unreadable text when dark mode is enabled

Name: Localization Setup
Description: Configure the internationalization framework to support multiple languages

Name: Translation Updates
Description: Extract hardcoded text strings and replace them with translation keys

Name: Avatar Upload
Description: Add functionality for users to upload and crop a profile picture

Name: Password Change
Description: Implement a secure form for authenticated users to change their password

Name: Password Recovery
Description: Develop the backend logic to generate and email password reset tokens

Name: Reset Page UI
Description: Create the frontend page where users input their new password

Name: Analytics Validation
Description: Verify that user events are being correctly sent to the analytics platform

Name: Z-Index Fix
Description: Resolve visual layering issues where modals appear behind the header

Name: CSS Modularization
Description: Refactor global CSS styles into modular components to prevent bleeding

Name: Backup Automation
Description: Create a cron job to automatically backup the database to S3 nightly

Name: Uptime Monitoring
Description: Configure external monitoring tools to alert the team in case of downtime

Name: Legal Pages
Description: Create static pages for Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

Name: Cookie Banner
Description: Implement a GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner

Name: Pre-release QA
Description: Conduct a comprehensive round of manual testing before the production release

Name: Checkout Bug Fix
Description: Fix an edge case where the checkout crashes if the cart contains 0 items

Name: Documentation
Description: Update the project README and developer guides with latest instructions

Name: Release Notes
Description: Draft the change log and release notes for version 1.0

Name: Production Launch
Description: Execute the deployment strategy to release version 1.0 to the public
